.entry-header
About Us
Welcome to Northdale Golf & Tennis Club, where you’re not just a guest but part of our golfing family. Our championship course, masterfully designed by the acclaimed golf course architect Ron Garl, beckons both local enthusiasts and visitors to Tampa Bay to discover the essence of Florida golf.
Our 18-hole, par-72 classic layout, measuring 6,824 yards from the championship tees, stands as a testament to the natural beauty of the Sunshine State. Set against the backdrop of unspoiled Florida terrain, our course features the serene beauty of majestic Cypress trees and shimmering spring-fed lakes. This captivating scenery creates a stage for a round of golf that marries challenge and enjoyment, making it accessible and satisfying for golfers of all skill levels.
What sets us apart and has garnered accolades from golfers near and far are our renowned CHAMPION Dwarf greens – often celebrated as “The Best Greens in Tampa Bay.” These greens, meticulously maintained, provide a canvas for golfers to showcase precision and skill. Putting on these surfaces is a genuine delight.
At Northdale, we offer more than just golf; we offer an experience that captures the true spirit of Florida golf. Our expansive fairways welcome you to demonstrate your skills, while our generous greens invite you to perfect your game. The natural surroundings provide the ideal blend of relaxation and excitement, delivering the quintessential Florida golf experience.
We invite you to become a part of the Northdale family. Every round at our course is an opportunity to create memories, an adventure waiting to be experienced, and a moment to embrace the essence of the game. We’re more than a golf course; we’re the embodiment of the Florida golfing spirit. Join us at Northdale Golf & Tennis Club and craft your own golfing story today.
.entry-content .clear
